mapper.select: SELECT id, title, CONCAT('layui-icon ', icon) AS icon, path AS href, IF(type = 'menu', 1, 0) AS type, IF(iframe = 'iframe', '_iframe', iframe) AS openType FROM sys_menu_info WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY order_num ASC

SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.title, a.path AS href, CONCAT('layui-icon ', a.icon) AS icon, IF(a.type ='menu',1,0) AS type, IF(a.iframe = 'iframe', '_iframe', a.iframe) AS openType FROM sys_menu_info a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.id = b.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_user c ON c.role_id = b.role_id
a.parent_id=#{parentId} AND a.visible = '1'
AND c.user_id = #{userId}
ORDER BY a.order_num ASC
